prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.


        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Chakalaka Cheese Toast with Fried Egg",
  "description": "Fast, comforting toast topped with mild chakalaka and melted cheddar, finished with a sunny-side egg. Uses the air fryer for the toast and stovetop for the egg.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat air fryer to 180°C.",
    "Grate cheddar cheese.",
    "Stir chakalaka to loosen.",
    "Lightly butter one side of each bread slice.",
    "Set a nonstick frying pan on the stovetop and have oil ready.",
    "Lay out salt and pepper for seasoning."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Air-fry the bread slices, buttered side up, for 2 minutes to start crisping.",
    "Spread chakalaka over the toast and top evenly with grated cheddar cheese.",
    "Return toast to the air fryer and cook 2–4 minutes until cheese is melted and edges are golden.",
    "Heat oil in the frying pan over medium heat and crack in the egg; cook sunny-side up until whites are set.",
    "Plate the cheesy chakalaka toast, top with the fried egg, and season with salt and pepper to taste."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "bread",
      "quantity": "2 slices",
      "preparation": "buttered on top side"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chakalaka",
      "quantity": "1/3 cup",
      "preparation": "stirred"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cheddar cheese",
      "quantity": "40 g",
      "preparation": "grated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "eggs",
      "quantity": "1"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "butter",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "softened"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oil",
      "quantity": "1 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "pinch"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pepper",
      "quantity": "pinch"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian",
      "Omnivore"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],

      "Simple"
    ],

      "Solo"

    ],

    ]
  }
}
        ```
